text: { "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/controls": { "text": "<$list filter='[all[shadows]tag[$:/tags/Stylesheet]prefix[$:/plugins/]limit[1]]'> <$macrocall $name='tabs' tabsList='[all[shadows]tag[$:/tags/Stylesheet]prefix[$:/plugins/]]' default={{!!title}} class='tc-vertical' template='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/template'/> ", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/controls", "tags": "plugin $:/tags/ControlPanel/Appearance", "caption": "Plugin Tweaks" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/icon": { "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/icon", "tags": "plugin $:/tags/Image" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/readme": { "text": "This plugin adds to the appearance tab in the control panel. It provides edit fields for changing plugin stylesheet values that are stored in fields. Simply drag $:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks to the top of your tiddlywiki display, save and reload. This plugin comprises: * Control settings * Template", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/readme", "tags": "plugin" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/template": { "text": "<$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$list filter='[all[current]fields[]sort[title]] -caption -created -creator -modified -modifier -tags -text -title' variable='currentField'> <$text text=<>/>: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field=<> placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Fields/Add/Value/Placeholder}}/> ", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/template", "tags": "plugin" } } }
title: $:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks
